channels.label: Volume

channels.description: Mute/unmute your device

channels.label: Control
channels.description: Control the Kodi Player, e.g. start/stop/next/previous/ffward/rewind

channels.label: Stop
channels.description: Stops the player. ON if the player is stopped.

channels.label: Play URI
channels.description: Play the given URI

channels.label: Play PVR tv
channels.description: Play the given PVR TV channel

channels.description: Play the given PVR Radio channel

channels.description: Title of the current PVR channel

channels.label: Show Notification
channels.description: Shows a notification on the UI

channels.label: Send a key
channels.description: Sends a key stroke to the Kodi Player to navigate in the UI

channels.label: Sends text as input
channels.description: Sends a text to the Kodi Player to simulate keyboard text entry

channels.label: Send system command
channels.description: Sends a system command to Kodi. This allows to shutdown/suspend/hibernate/reboot Kodi
